Detailed Description

template<class Input1_, class Input2_>
class stream::make_tuple< Input1_, Input2_, Stopper, Stopper, Stopper, Stopper >

Creates stream of 2-tuples (pairs) from 2 input streams.

Template parameters:

  • Input1_ type of the 1st input
  • Input2_ type of the 2nd input
    Remarks:
    A specialization of make_tuple .
